sense.def:
Oseba ali ustanova, ki je
scrupulous
, zelo pazi, da je vse, kar dela, pravično, pošteno ali moralno pravilno.

seg.quote: The paper was not entirely scrupulous in setting out its assumptions.
...the pressure on manufacturers to behave scrupulously.

sense.def:
Izraz
scrupulous
pomeni tudi temeljit, natančen ali pozoren na podrobnosti.

seg.quote: They pay scrupulous attention to style.
